column4: Hey everyone - I'm running a script in etc/init.d/ at boot, which powers on a Ventrilo server, and I've added it to Sessions. Now, it's working, but it runs the script before my desktop has loaded (x/gnome etc.) and I don't want that. I want it to run after I've logged in
change the runlevel, i dont know how, but you can choose somewhere the runlevel, google for it
the boot procedure is divided in runlevels, thats what i know
